name: beast-ball
effect: Used in battle : Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon. If the wild Pokémon is an Ultra Beast, this ball has a catch rate of 5×. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 0.1×. If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 5× for Ultra Beasts and 0.1× for all other Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.
